meanings.definition: Concerned chiefly or only with oneself
meanings.sent1: She always makes selfish decisions without thinking about others.
meanings.sent2: It is selfish to only think about yourself and not consider others.
meanings.sent3: His selfish behavior at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The selfish cat refused to share its food with the other animals.
meanings.sent5: The selfish child hoarded all the toys for himself, not sharing with anyone.

meanings.definition: Lacking consideration for others; concerned chiefly with one's own personal profit or pleasure
meanings.sent1: The selfish businessman only cared about making money for himself.
meanings.sent2: It is selfish to ignore the needs and feelings of others for personal gain.
meanings.sent3: Her selfish desire for the last piece of cake was comical.
meanings.sent4: The selfish tree hogged all the sunlight, leaving the other plants in shade.
meanings.sent5: The selfish driver cut off other cars on the road, only thinking of his own time.
